transcript.text: Shalom Shalom Shalom this is daniel john
lee with tour restoration ministries it
is the final day of the ninth heber
month 29th day of the ninth heber month
tonight does start new moons january
first 2014 i posted three parts of a
preaching video that my wife filmed at
me today when we were down at Pioneer
Square but it only showed a very small
portion of the time we were down there
may be the first 20 30 minutes or so we
were actually down there for two full
hours we got there a little before noon
pretty shallow wait till 2pm little past
2 p.m. and we preached there and there
was just a lot of amazing things that
happened this lady named Marie which you
see at the very end of the video we're
actually to Minister able to minister
her for quite a bit more and we invited
her to the sky troop praying that she'll
come there were you know there were some
hecklers and things like that they're
also people trying to film us which was
just wickedness like people that
obviously had ill intent I even went up
to one lady to try to give her track
which was very cold and walked off but
we just pray the blood pre the blood and
pray that that gets disarmed but there's
also some amazing things we we went to
different parts of the square the
Pioneer Square I was there in that one
place for a while where my wife is
filming where I was standing on that
circle which I causes my voice to
reverberate because of the way the
engineers denied designed the Pioneer
Square but then you know my wife was
like hey let's go to some other places
where more people can hear you next to
the sidewalk so we did that we found two
other locations and there was one guy an
Asian guy who he didn't believe in yacht
all but he was he was very open he took
a track and then toward the end of our
time at the square right right before
about to leave I ran to the sky who had
said hallelujah earlier and then I saw
him again with some friends of his and
his name was Robby and he was
african-american young man looked like
he was maybe in his mid-20s and he was
so open I mean so unbelievably open he
even took a picture with me but he was
so open he was asking so many questions
about the tories like yeah I've heard
some preachers before at the square and
they're off but I heard you preaching
and you set it right on like you
preached the doctrine of grace and I
said yeah you're not saved by Torah
you're saved by his blood and his grit
his grace that
teaches us to denial and godliness and
to keep the tour he's like yeah that's
right on and he asked me struggle
questions about Apostle Paul in the New
Testament I gave him the website I've
run out of website cards but I just gave
him one of my hand handmade tracks and
gave him a website and he's actually
from Arizona he was just visiting
portland but he wants to start coming to
the sky crib but I'm really praying he
will his name's Robbie so pray for him
and he was visiting some friends of his
that were in Portland those friends were
there with him but just incredibly open
incredibly hungry just his face was
shining I mean it it was awesome there
was another woman I noticed and purple
that was sitting down I wanted to get a
tractor but just didn't get there in
time she got on the max before we could
but she was I could see her nodding her
head and just absorbing the stuff so
there were there were people that yah
was reached today and I just wanted to
give this preaching report in addition
to the actual street preaching so you
guys would know that I thank you for
your prayers thank you the word went out
on this pagan New Year's Day it's
actually not new years it's we're just
about to get to the 10th hiboo month so
I just wanted to give that blessing
thank you for all your prayers this is
daniel john lee with tour restoration
ministries website is ww spirit and tour
com thank you yah bless and continue to
